results.title: Cities and climate challenges in southeast asia [electronic resource]. Melinda Martinus.
abstracts: The Climate Change in Southeast Asia Workshop and Compendium Series is a platform to facilitate and promote research on climate-related issues in the Southeast Asian region. Organized by the Climate Change in Southeast Asia Programme at the ISEAS – Yusof Ishak Institute, the objective of this platform is to facilitate knowledge exchange and share best practices to deepen understanding of the complex and multidimensional nature of climate change. This inaugural publication sheds light on varied and contextual experiences of Southeast Asian urban communities in addressing climate challenges and scenarios for future policy making.

results.title: Rising china and new chinese migrants in southeast asia [electronic resource]. Leo Suryadinata.
abstracts: New Chinese migration is a recent development that has just entered an initial phase. An overarching theme and conclusion across the sixteen chapters in this volume is that China's policy towards Chinese migrants has changed from period to period, and it is still too early for us to determine if Beijing will continue to pursue the policy of luoye guigen (return to original roots) or will revert to one of luodi shenggen (sink into local roots). The various chapters also show that the profile, motivations and outlooks of xin yimin (new Chinese migrants) have become more diverse, while local reactions to these new migrants have become less accommodating with increasing nationalism.

results.title: 商代社会的文化与观念(culture and values in shang dynasty) [electronic resource]. 朱彦民.
abstracts: 本书是"中国思想与社会文丛"之一，分为上下两编，主要对商代社会的思想、文化与观念展开细致梳理，意图对于上古时代的思想脉络有所把握与创见，并进一步推动上古史的研究。 作者朱彦民之前对于殷墟文化有所研究，此书是在更宽广的学术视野上审视商代历史与社会。(This book is one of the "Chinese Thoughts and Society Series", which is divided into two series, mainly combing on the thoughts, culture and values in Shang Dynasty, and is aimed at grasping and obtaining brand-new ideas about the ancient times and further promoting the study of ancient history.Previously the author, Zhu Yanmin has made investigations on Yin Dynasty ruins culture, and this book examines the history and society of Shang Dynasty from a broader academic vision.)

results.title: 汉语主观性主观量框式结构研究(study on frame structure of subjectivity and subjective quantity in chinese) [electronic resource]. 董淑慧.
abstracts: 本书研究的对象是汉语中表达主观性和主观量的"框式结构"。所谓"框式结构"，用邵敬敏先生在《"连A也／都B"框式结构的争议及其框式化进程》（2008）一文中的定义则为："前后有两个不连贯的词语相互照应，相互依存，形成一个框架式结构，具有特殊的语法意义和特定的语用功能......"李振中在《试论现代汉语框式结构》（2008）一文中也给出过定义："由固定成分搭配而成的一种具有框架性质的固定的语法结构。任何框架都由'框架'和'空位'两部分构成。""框式结构"具有"固定性、独立性和生成性"等特点。《汉语主观性主观量框式结构研究》基于这样一个"框式结构"的认识，把讨论范围限定于短语和单旬层面；理论上以构式语法理论为主，侧重形式与意义相匹配的整体意义和功能的研究。从研究角度看，着力探讨和挖掘汉语"框式结构"所隐含的"主观性"和"主观量"的特性。(This book studies the "frame structure" of subjectivity and subjective quantity in Chinese expression. The so-called "frame structure", as Mr. Shao Jingmin defined in "The Controversy of Frame Structure of Even A/ also B" and The Process of Its formation", means: "Two incoherent adjacent words help each other and rely on each other, forming a frame structure, which has a special meaning and a specific function"Li Zhen also gave a definition in "Discussion on the Frame structure of Modern Chinese"(2008), "A fixed grammatical structure formed of collocation of fixed elements with framework character, each of which consists of "frame" and "space"". "frame structure" has the characters of "stationary, independence, generativity,etc".On the basis of the awareness of "frame structure", "Study on Frame Structure of Subjectivity and Subjective Quantity in Chinese " limits the discussion range to the dimension of phrases and single sentences. Based on the construction of grammatical theory, it stresses on research of overall meaning and function of the form that matches its meaning that. From a research perspective, the book focuses on exploration of the feature of "subjectivity" and "subjective quantity" that "frame structure" contains.)

results.title: 中国经济改革大逻辑( the economic reform logic in contemporary china) [electronic resource]. 张晓晶.
abstracts: 本书通过中国经济改革30余年的历程——从改革的起点，到市场化体制的逐步完善，再到进入深水区后的改革再出发，揭示出中国经济改革的六大逻辑：改革具有周期性，从快速推进到陷入僵局，改革须重建共识；改革是个系统工程，经济改革离不开其他领域的配套改革；改革、发展与稳定的三维统一，与西方主流理论更多强调效率的一维视角迥然相异；中国的改革实践与理论逻辑相吻合，超越了渐进与激进的争论；改革顶层设计应与摸着石头过河相结合；中国的持续改革是在全球制度竞争与改革竞争中进行的。最后指出，中国不断进行改革的原动力，正是为了"保有"社会主义制度的不变色。( According to the over 30-year economic reform in contemporary China, from the starting point of reform to the gradual perfection of marketization system and the redoing reform after it enters into the critical stage, this book reveals six kinds of logic of China's economic reform. Firstly, reform has periodicity. As the fast-proceeding reform came to a deadlock, the consensus about reform must be rebuilt; secondly, reform is a systematic project, so economic reform is related with coordinated reform of other fields tightly; thirdly, the three-dimensional integration of reform, development and stability is widely different from the Western mainstream theory, one-dimensional perspective, which stresses efficiency; fourthly, the practice and theoretical logic of China's reform coincide with each other and surpass the dispute of gradual progress and aggressive progress; fifthly, the top-layer design of reform should be integrated with groping and practice; sixthly, China's sustained reform is carried out under the competition and reform of global system. At last, it points out that the initiative impetus of China's constant reform is to "keep" the original color of the socialist system.)

results.title: 太平天国北方战场( the northern battlefield of taiping heavenly kingdom ) [electronic resource]. 李惠民.
abstracts: 本书以详实的史料，对太平军北方战场的主要将领、战术、管理、纪律、情报、俘虏政策、后勤伙食等都进行了详细考察。经过与作者沟通，增加了故事与主要人物的描写，增加了对战争场面的描述，比如在京津、山东的战争。增强了受众关心的问题如北援军问题、北方地方团练问题影响整个北方战场的胜负得失。本书深入浅出，语言明白晓畅，可读性很强。( With detailed and accurate historical data, this book studies the main generals, tactics, management, discipline, intelligence, policy on captives, food of logistics and others of the northern battlefield of the Taiping Army in detail. After the communication with the author, the description of stories, main characters and the battle scene such as the battles in Beijing, Tianjin and Shandong is added. Issues of the reader's attention, such as northern reinforcement and group training in northern areas which were the key to the success of the northern battlefield are explained carefully. This book explains the profound in simple and understandable terms so that readers can get the point easily.)

results.title: 汉语中致使范畴的结构类型研究(a typological study of causatives in chinese) [electronic resource]. 牛顺心.
abstracts: 本书以语言类型学理论为框架讨论汉语中致使结构的句法类型及发展脉络，并与其他汉藏语的致使结构进行了对比研究。致使范畴是人类语言中普遍存在的一个语义范畴。(Adopting a framework of linguistic typology theory , this book discusses syntactic categories and the development process of causative structures in Chinese , and compares them with those of other Sino-Tibetan. Causative category is a ubiquitous semantic category in human language.)

results.title: 中国学生最好奇的奥秘大发现：世界之最(mysteries discovery: world records) [electronic resource]. Xing Tao.
abstracts: 《中国学生最好奇的奥秘大发现:世界之最》以知识性、科学性、趣味性为出发点，涉及天文、地理、文学、体育、艺术、建筑等方面。书中所列"世界之最"极具代表性，能向少年儿童宣传和普及有关的科学知识，引导他们学科学、爱科学。除此之外，《中国学生最好奇的奥秘大发现:世界之最》还收集了大量珍贵的图片，可令读者在增长知识的同时开阔眼界，真正做到："不看不知道，世界真奇妙！"

results.title: Writing with pleasure [electronic resource]. Helen Sword.
abstracts: An essential guide to cultivating joy in your professional and personal writing  Writing should be a pleasurable challenge, not a painful chore.  Writing with Pleasure  empowers academic, professional, and creative writers to reframe their negative emotions about writing and reclaim their positive ones. By learning how to cast light on the shadows, you will soon find yourself bringing passion and pleasure to everything you write. Acclaimed international writing expert Helen Sword invites you to step into your "WriteSPACE"—a space of pleasurable writing that is socially balanced, physically engaged, aesthetically nourishing, creatively challenging, and emotionally uplifting. Sword weaves together cutting-edge findings in the sciences and social sciences with compelling narratives gathered from nearly six hundred faculty members and graduate students from across the disciplines and around the world. She provides research-based principles, hands-on strategies, and creative "pleasure prompts" designed to help you ramp up your productivity and enhance the personal rewards of your writing practice. Whether you're writing a scholarly article, an administrative email, or a love letter, this book will inspire you to find delight in even the most mundane writing tasks and a richer, deeper pleasure in those you already enjoy. Exuberantly illustrated by prizewinning graphic memoirist Selina Tusitala Marsh,  Writing with Pleasure  is an indispensable resource for academics, students, professionals, and anyone for whom writing has come to feel like a burden rather than a joy.

results.title: Write for your life [electronic resource] : A guide to clear and purposeful writing (and presentations). Charles Wheelan.
abstracts: The best-selling author's practical guide to writing clearly and convincingly in every professional setting.    How would you create a winning pitch for your latest investment idea? Or persuasively argue for a major policy change? Or successfully ask your boss for a raise? The answer: clear and effective communication, whether in writing or through a presentation.   Best-selling author Charles Wheelan has spent decades mastering effective communication skills in his work as a writer, college professor, journalist, speechwriter, political candidate, and public speaker. In Write for Your Life, he shares his best tips. Taking readers through all the steps required to arrive at a coherent first draft, he then explains the best ways to improve and fine-tune your writing. He covers how to organize and present information, why it's necessary to adapt your tone to different audiences, and when to use summaries, sidebars, bullet points, and other tools for making information more digestible. He explores the truth behind popular clichés like "Show, don't tell" and "Kill your darlings," and discusses the proper use and attribution of quotations from secondary sources. And he goes on to cover how to speak effectively, providing helpful advice for preparing a winning presentation or delivering a speech.   Writing with his signature wit and humor, Wheelan illustrates his points with entertaining examples from his own life, as well as memorable anecdotes from leading magazine and newspaper writers, political figures from Winston Churchill to Barack Obama and Elena Kagan, and a diverse array of the best communicators from the worlds of culture, sports, and politics. Write for Your Life is an essential guide for anyone needing to get their ideas across whether in an email, memo, report, presentation, fund-raising letter, or speech.

results.title: Falsehood and fallacy [electronic resource] : How to think, read, and write in the twenty-first century. Bethany Kilcrease.
abstracts: Falsehood and Fallacy  emphasizes that in our politically divided landscape, we all need to be able to read and research more critically in order to make well-reasoned arguments.

results.title: Authentic writing [electronic resource]. Jeffrey Rice.
abstracts: In typical academic circles, texts must be critiqued, mined for the obfuscated meanings they hide, and shown to reveal larger, broader meanings than what are initially evident. To engage in this type of writing is to perform an authentic version of scholarship. But what if a scholar chooses instead to write without critique? What if they write about travelling, their children, food, grocery shopping, frozen garlic bread, sandwiches, condiments, falafel, yoga, and moments that normally wouldn't be considered scholarly? Can the writing still be scholarly? Can scholarly writing be authentic if its topics comprise the everyday?    In  Authentic Writing,  Jeff Rice uses this question to trace a position regarding critique, the role of the scholar, the role of the personal in scholarship, the banal as subject matter, and the idea of authenticity. He explores authenticity as a writing issue, a rhetorical issue, a consumption issue, a culture issue, and an ideological issue. Rather than arguing for a more authentic state or practice, Rice examines the rhetorical features of authenticity in order to expand the focus of scholarship.

results.title: The quick fix guide to academic writing [electronic resource] : How to avoid big mistakes and small errors. Phillip C Shon.
abstracts: Whether you're writing a paper, essay, assignment, or dissertation, this short and punchy book helps you improve your writing skills through minimal effort.   Providing you with a quick set of writing rules to follow, this tried and tested guide uses a unique and easy to follow grid-based system. Packed with advice on understanding (big and little) common errors made in academic writing, it helps you identify patterns in your own writing and demonstrates how to reshape or re-evaluate them - and raise your writing game in any academic context.    How-to tutorials include:   Synthesizing and critiquing literature – and using your coding sheet to develop critical arguments    Shaping abstracts, introductions, discussions, and conclusions – to improve the logic and structure of your writing    Applying lessons-learned to future projects, whatever format of academic writing.    Save time and improve your grades, with this essential quick fix guide!      The   Student Success  series are essential guides for students of all levels. From how to think critically and write great essays to planning your dream career, the  Student Success  series helps you study smarter and get the best from your time at university. Visit the SAGE Study Skills hub for tips and resources for study success!.

results.title: Revise [electronic resource] : The scholar-writer's essential guide to tweaking, editing, and perfecting your manuscript. Pamela Haag.
abstracts: A helpful, engaging guide to the revision of scholarly writing by an editor and award-winning author     "Pamela Haag has been called 'the tenure whisperer' for good reason. Any scholar who hopes to attract a wider audience of readers will benefit from the brilliant, step-by-step guidance shared here. It's pure gold for all aspiring nonfiction writers."—Nancy MacLean, author of  Democracy in Chains: The Deep History of the Radical Right's Stealth Plan for America    Writing and revision are two different skills. Many scholar-writers have learned something about how to write, but fewer know how to read and revise their own writing, spot editorial issues, and transform a draft from passable to great. Drawing on before and after examples from more than a decade as a developmental editor of scholarly works, Pamela Haag tackles the most common challenges of scholarly writing. This book is packed with practical, user-friendly advice and is written with warmth, humor, sympathy, and flair.  With an inspiring passion for natural language, Haag demonstrates how to reconcile clarity with intellectual complexity. Designed to be an in-the-trenches desktop reference, this indispensable resource can help scholars develop a productive self-editing habit, advise their graduate and other students on style, and, ultimately, get their work published and praised.

results.title: The work of teaching writing [electronic resource] : Learning from fiction, film, and drama. Joseph Harris.
abstracts: Film and literature can illuminate the experience of teaching and learning writing in ways that academic books and articles often miss. In particular, popular books and movies about teaching reveal the crucial importance of taking students seriously as writers and intellectuals. In this book, Joseph Harris explores how the work of teaching writing has been depicted in novels, films, and plays to reveal what teachers can learn from studying not just theories of discourse, rhetoric, or pedagogy but also accounts of the lived experience of teaching writing.    Each chapter examines a fictional representation of writing classes— Dead Poets Society ,  Up the Down Staircase ,  Educating Rita ,  Push , and more—and shifts the conversation from how these works portray teachers to how they dramatize the actual work of teaching. Harris considers scenes of instruction from different stages of the writing process and depictions of students and teachers at work together to highlight the everyday aspects of teaching writing.    In the writing classroom the ideas of teachers come to life in the work of their students.  The Work of Teaching Writing  shows what fiction, film, and drama can convey about the moment of exchange between teacher and student as they work together to create new insights into writing. It will interest both high school and undergraduate English teachers, as well as graduate students and scholars in composition and rhetoric, literary studies, and film studies.

results.title: Writing for social scientists [electronic resource] : How to start and finish your thesis, book, or article. Howard Becker.
abstracts: For more than thirty years,  Writing for Social Scientist s has been a lifeboat for writers in all fields, from beginning students to published authors. It starts with a powerful reassurance: Academic writing is stressful, and even accomplished scholars like sociologist Howard S. Becker struggle with it. And it provides a clear solution: In order to learn how to write, take a deep breath and then begin writing. Revise. Repeat.  This is not a book about sociological writing. Instead, Becker applies his sociologist's eye to some of the common problems all academic writers face, including trying to get it right the first time, failing, and therefore not writing at all; getting caught up in the trappings of "proper" academic writing; writing to impress rather than communicate with readers; and struggling with the when and how of citations. He then offers concrete advice, based on his own experiences and those of his students and colleagues, for overcoming these obstacles and gaining confidence as a writer.    While the underlying challenges of writing have remained the same since the book first appeared, the context in which academic writers work has changed dramatically, thanks to rapid changes in technology and ever greater institutional pressures. This new edition has been updated throughout to reflect these changes, offering a new generation of scholars and students encouragement to write about society or any other scholarly topic clearly and persuasively.    As Becker writes in the new preface, "Nothing prepared me for the steady stream of mail from readers who found the book helpful. Not just helpful. Several told me the book had saved their lives; less a testimony to the book as therapy than a reflection of the seriousness of the trouble writing failure could get people into." As academics are being called on to write more often, in more formats, the experienced, rational advice in  Writing for Social Scientists  will be an important resource for any writer's shelf.

results.title: 《資治通鑑》十六國資料釋證.前秦、後秦國部分( data release of 16 states of comprehensive mirror in aid of governance- pre-qin and after-qin states) [electronic resource]. 陳勇.
abstracts: 本书为《通鉴》十六国资料中前秦、后秦国部分资料的整理研究。作者将《通鉴》的前秦、后秦国资料全部辑出，逐条与相应的正史及其他文献对读，甄别其文字、内容的异同与真伪，意在深入挖掘司马光等人精心筛选、摘录或改编的这批珍贵史料，为十六国史研究提供一种基础性的文本。( This book is a systematic study of part of the date of the pre-Qin and after-Qin states among the 16 ones of Comprehensive Mirror in Aid of Governance. The author lists the whole data of the pre-Qin and after-Qin states of the book and compare them with other information of the corresponding history books and other references one by one, distinguishes the similarities and differences as well as the truth and false of the words and content, aiming at digging the valuable historical data carefully selected, extracted or adapted by Sima Guang and others, thus to provide a basic book for the study of the history of the 16 states.)

results.title: 梨园文献与优伶演剧 (pear garden literature and actor performance) [electronic resource] : 京剧昆曲文献史料考论 (research on documentary sources of peking opera and kunqu opera ). 谷曙光.
abstracts: 京剧昆曲既是中国传统文化的精粹，亦是考察中国社会、文化的一个独特视角。清代以降，戏曲的重心已从案头转移到了舞台、由文本更迭为表演。清乾隆以后的戏曲史，实即一部优伶演剧史。  本书立足于文、音、像、档等"梨园文献"，专注其特有的综合性、多元性和鲜活性，以之观照清中叶以来的剧坛变迁和优伶爨演。概言之，文献是基石，梨园是生态，优伶是主体，而演剧是研究的终极目标。发现新材料、关注珍稀史料，乃本书一大特色；议论出于文献，则是研究始终秉持的理念；而优伶与演剧，又是本书的着力点。本书首次标举"梨园文献"的概念，案头与场上贯通，文献与思辨并重，尝试创新研究范式，切实推进清乾嘉以迄民国的戏曲研究。( Peking Opera and Kunqu Opera are the essence of traditional Chinese culture, and a unique perspective on the Chinese society and culture. Since the Qing Dynasty, the focus of opera has been shifted to the stage from the desk, and changed from text to show. The history of the opera after the Qianlong period of the Qing Dynasty is an actor performance history. Based on "text, sound, images, files and other literature of Pear Garden, this book focuses on the unique comprehensiveness, diversity and liveliness of operas, and studies the changes in the opera circles and actor performances since the middle Qing Dynasty. In a word, literature is the cornerstone, Pear Garden is ecology, actor is the main body, and performance is the ultimate goal of the research. Finding new material and paying attention to the rare historical data are a major characteristic of this book; citing discussion from literature is the concept always upheld; and the actor and the performance are the focal point of the book. This book for the first time upholds the concept of "literature of Pear Garden", combing the desk and stage, paying equal importance to literature and philosophy as speculation, trying to innovate research paradigm, and effectively promoting the opera research from the Qianlong and Jiaqing periods of the Qing Dynasty to the period of the Republic of China.)

results.title: 中国古代哲学史(a history of ancient chinese philosophy) [electronic resource]. 张连良.
abstracts: 中西哲学在起源阶段的根本不同，必然导致二者在哲学史的发展脉络中的差异性。中国哲学应该回归到原来的"天人合一"精神的超越性与经验性、神圣性与世俗性的有机统一，从西方哲学的哲学范式恢复到传统中国文化的有机统一。 (Fundamentally different origin stages of Chinese and western philosophy inevitably leads to the difference in the development course of the history of philosophy. Chinese philosophy should return to the original organic unification of transcendence and empirical quality, or holiness and secularity of the spirit of "oneness of man and nature" and recover from the philosophical paradigm of western philosophy to the organic integration of traditional Chinese culture.)

results.title: 《红楼梦》研究述论( on the study of dream of the red chamber) [electronic resource]. 伏漫戈.
abstracts: 本书以1754年至21世纪《红楼梦》的作者、主题、人物、结构、后四十回、版本、脂评、成书研究中的重点、难点、热点为研究对象。( This book takes the key, difficult and hot points of the studies from 1754 to the 21st century about the author, themes, characters, structures, the later forty chapters, versions, Zhiyanzhai version and compilation of Dream of the Red Chamber as the study object.)

results.title: 慎德研究 (research on moral cultivation) [electronic resource] : 以儒家传统为中心 (centered on the confucian tradition). 郝玉明.
abstracts: 本书以儒家伦理文化为基本的研究视阈，对"慎德"的一般意义、道德内涵、历史演变、伦理结构、基本原则、 个体修养、政治实践进行了理论阐述。分析了传统" 慎德"的历史影响和现代价值，将"慎德"置于当代社会的转型时期，赋予其新的伦理精神、道德内涵和理论内容，并总结了"慎德"在中国道德结构中的地 位、特点及其重要性，对其未来发展趋向进行了展望。( This book takes the Confucian ethics culture as the basic research visual threshold, and carries out theoretical elaboration of the general meaning, the moral connotation, the historical evolution, the ethics structure, the basic principle, the individual accomplishment and the political practice of "moral cultivation". It analyzes the historical influence and the modern value of traditional "moral cultivation", places "moral cultivation" in the transformation period of contemporary society, giving it the new spirit of ethics, moral connotation and theoretical content, and summarizes the status, characteristics and importance of "moral cultivation" in Chinese moral structure and looks into its future development trend.)

results.title: 风骚诗脉与唐诗精神( essence of feng sao and spirits of poems in the tang dynasty) [electronic resource]. 李金坤.
abstracts: 在三千余年中国诗史上，《诗经》《楚辞》与唐诗无疑是三座彪炳千秋的历史丰碑。李金坤所著的《 风骚诗脉与唐诗精神》深入探究了"风"（《诗经》 ）"骚"（《楚辞》）诗脉与唐诗之间承继发展的关系，特别在题旨之传承、体式之仿效、意象之摄取、 意境之融化、技巧之借鉴、语典之袭用、绿色情思之观照诸方面，新见迭出，阐论精微，情理兼具，鞭辟入里，是一部别开生面的学术专著。其出版对于了解 、研究我国诗歌文学发展史具有重要的理论价值。 ( In the history of poetry of over 3,000 years, Classic of Poetry, The Verse of Chu and poetry of the Tang Dynasty are absolutely three historical monuments which will shine forever. Essence of Feng Sao and Spirits of Poems in Dynasty written by Li Jinkun further studies the heritage and development relationship between the essence of "Feng (national customs" (Classic of Poetry) and "Sao (Encountering Sorrow)" (The Verse of Chu) and poetry of the Tang Dynasty. Especially, it inherits the subjects, imitates the form of characters or letters, takes in the images, integrates the artistic conceptions, takes example by skills, takes over literary quotations, observes the green thoughts and other aspects. It expounds many new different views meticulously and is reasonable and penetrating, being an academic monograph which breaks fresh ground. Its publishment has a significant theoretical value on understanding and researching the development history of Chinese poetry literature.)

results.title: 汉语句法语义标记词羡余研究( study on the redundancy of chinese syntactic-semantic markers) [electronic resource]. 邵洪亮.
abstracts: 本书从语言功能出发，有所选择地运用语义语法学理论、语法化理论、标记理论，以及认知和类型学的相关理论，从一种新的视角考察汉语句法语义层面的标记词羡余现象及相关问题，重点研究了题元标记词和时体标记词的功能羡余问题。本书既从共时的角度对虚词的语义标记功能及其羡余现象作相对细致的描写，又从历时的角度考察部分羡余标记词的产生、固化、弱化或功能转移的过程，以及对语言系统产生的影响。研究过程力求描写和解释相结合，宏观研究和微观个案分析相结合。相信这些基础性研究将对对外汉语教学和中文信息处理在相关领域的深入起到积极作用。( Starting from linguistic function, this book selectively employs semantic grammatical theory, grammaticalization theory, markedness theory and relevant theories of cognition and typology on investigating the redundancy phenomena of Chinese syntactic-semantic markers and relevant problems from a new perspective and focuses on studying the functional redundancy problems of thematic and tense-aspect markers. This book relatively describes the semantic marking functions and the redundancy phenomena of structural words in detail from the synchronic perspective and investigates the production, solidification, weakness or function transfer process of some redundant markers and their effect on language system from the diachronic perspective. Description and explanation, macro-research and the analysis of micro individual cases should be combined in the research process to the utmost. These basic researches will play a positive role in deeply applying the teaching of Chinese as a foreign language and Chinese information processing to relevant fields.)

results.title: 中国股票市场一体化演进问题研究( research on the integration evolution of chinese stock markets ) [electronic resource]. 唐齐鸣.
abstracts: 本书的主要内容是将食货派的政治与学术分开考察，把食货派创办的《食货》半月刊、天津《益世报·食货周刊》和南京《中央日报·食货周刊》，以及食货派出版的多部著作及他们在其他报刊杂志上发表的论文，放在近代中国社会经济史及整个中国近现代史学发展的脉络中加以考察，全面探讨食货派的史学成就及不足之处。一方面从纵向考察了食货派的兴衰历程，另一方面围绕食货派的学术研究，分中国社会经济史研究、史学思想、治史方法三个专题展开全面而深入的探讨。最后考察食货派的史学影响并对其历史地位进行评价。 ( This book mainly investigates the politics and science of the Shihuo (Food Commodities) School respectively and studies the semimonthly Shihuo, Yishibao - Shihuo Weekly in Tianjin, Central Daily News - Shihuo Weekly in Nanjing established by the Shihuo School and many works they published and papers published in other newspapers and periodicals in the context of the social and economic history of modern China and the development of Chinese modern and contemporary history to comprehensively discuss the historiography achievements and deficiencies of the Shihuo School. On the one hand, it lengthways investigates the rise and fall of the Shihuo School, on the other hand, it comprehensively and deeply investigates the academic studies of the Shihuo School from three special subjects, namely the research on Chinese social and economic history, the historical thought and the methodology of learning and studying history. At last, it investigates the historical influence of the Shihuo School and evaluates its historical status.)

results.title: 考古发现与《易》学溯源研究( the study on archaeological finds and the origin of the yi studies) [electronic resource]. 张金平.
abstracts: 《易》包括《易经》和《易传》两部分，探求这两部分定型前的起源和发展过程以及在这个过程中有哪些因素影响了或成为了《易》的内容，都属于《易》学溯源研究。本书研究的时间范围界定为史前时期和商周时期。本书从以下几个方面展开论述：考古发现与《易》学卜筮文化溯源、考古发现与《易》学阴阳观、考古发现与《易》学尚中思想、考古发现与商周筮数易卦研究。( Yi includes two parts, I Ching and Yi Chuan. Searching the origin and development process before the two parts formed and what factors influenced or became the content of Yi in the process is the study on origin of the Yi studies. The time range studied in this book is defined as the prehistoric period and the Shang and Zhou dynasties. This book launches the elaboration from following several aspects: the archaeological finds and origin of Yi studies divination culture, archaeological finds and concept of yin and yang in Yi studies, archaeological finds and numeral divination study in the Shang and Zhou dynasties.)

results.title: 疾病对中国现代作家创作的影响研究 (influence of diseases on the creation of chinese modern writers) [electronic resource] : 以鲁迅、孙犁、史铁生为例 (take lu xun, sun li and shi tiesheng as examples). 程桂婷.
abstracts: 本书主要以中国现代文学史上长期患病的作家(特别是鲁迅、孙犁、史铁生三位件家)为研究对象，渊神医学、疾病心理学、创作心理学等综合视角的观照下，分析探究作家们的疾病史、病理过程、异常性格、内心纠葛与创作历程之间的关联，并着力揭示这种关联在他们的个人生活、创作活动和文学作品中的特殊作用与重要意义。( This book mainly studies the writers suffering from diseases for a long time in the history of modern Chinese literature (especially Lu Xun, Sun Li and Shi Tiesheng). With the observation from the comprehensive perspective of psychological medicine, psychology of diseases and creation psychology, it analyzes and explores the correlation between writers' disease history, pathological process, aberrant characters, inner entanglement and creation process, and tries to reveal the special role and significance of this correlation in their personal life, creation and literary works.)

results.title: 汉语派生式新词语研究( research on chinese new derivatives) [electronic resource]. 沈光浩.
abstracts: 本书主要运用定量和定性相结合、描写和解释相结合等研究方法，依据原型范畴理论、潜显理论等相关理论，对改革开放以来的汉语派生式新词语进行了全方位、多角度的研究。在充分占有派生词新词语语料的基础上，探讨了类词缀的确定和形成过程、派生词新词语的特点和生成机制等问题。( On the basis of relevant theories like prototype theory and implicit-explicit theory, this book mainly combines quantitative and qualitative analysis, description and explanation to carry out comprehensive and multi-perspective research on Chinese new derivatives since the reform and opening-up. Based on abundant corpora of new derivatives, it discusses the definition and forming process of quasi affixes, and problems like the features and formation mechanism of new derivatives.)

results.title: 流派论争 (dispute among schools) [electronic resource] : 明代文学的生存根基与演化场域 (survival foundation and evolution field of literature in ming dynasty). 冯小禄.
abstracts: 《流派论争(明代文学的生存根基与演化场域)》乃学界第一部用历史人文主义的眼光研究明代文学流派论争的生存和演化意义的学术专著。全书采用论题和时序相结合的论述方式，从诗文统系和取法争论，全国文学流派的盛衰演化，地域文学流派和全国文学流派的竞争，文学流派的时文根基和古文、时文之争四个方面展开论述，力图深刻展示明代文学流派论争的时代性、多层次性和丰厚的学术研究内涵。其间重点分析的诸多文学论争实质，文学流派盛衰转换的审美思想策略和社会心理机制，中晚明文学流派的宗法策略与其八股文观的表里融合特点等，均为前沿深度话题。 (Dispute among Schools (Survival Foundation and Evolution Field of Literature in Ming Dynasty) is the first academic writing which studies the survival and evolution significance of literary schools' dispute in Ming Dynasty from the perspective of historical humanism. By combining topics and time sequence, the book discusses four aspects: pedigree of poetry and option disputes, ups and downs of national literary schools, competition between regional literary schools and national literary schools, literary schools' root in contemporary proses and the dispute between contemporary proses and ancient style proses, trying to demonstrate in-depth the temporal spirit, multi-level nature and profound academic research significance of the dispute among literary schools in the Ming Dynasty. It focuses on the essence of various literary disputes, aesthetic thinking strategies and social-psychosocial mechanism of literary schools' ups and downs, features of patriarchal clan system strategies' blending with eight-legged essay perspective in literary schools in middle and late Ming Dynasty, which are all the leading edge and in-depth topics.)

results.title: 青少年道德修养的101个误区(101 morality mistakes of teenagers) [electronic resource]. 青少年道德修养的101个误区 编写组.
authors: 青少年道德修养的101个误区 编写组.
abstracts: 本书分交往篇、校园篇、心态篇、生活篇、处事篇、做人篇六篇内容来讲述道德修养的各方面，是一本全面阐述青少年道德修养的书籍。(This book is divided into six chapters including Relations, In Campus, Attitude, In Life, Problems Handling and Personhood to introduce different aspects of morality, explaining morality of teenagers comprehensively.)

results.title: 唐代“大手笔”作家研究( study of “great writers” in the tang dynasty) [electronic resource]. 曲景毅.
abstracts: 本书首次以唐代被史书或时人称作"大手笔"的作家为线索，着重考察颜师古、岑文本、李峤、崔融、张说、常衮、李吉甫、李德裕等九人的应用文写作成就及对唐代文坛的影响，检视"大手笔"作家与唐代文风、儒学的关系，并挖掘他们的文学史意义，探讨他们在后世的接受及文学声名消解的原因。( This book, for the first time, was considered in history book or by people of the time as a work that takes "great" writers of the Tang Dynasty as the clue, focuses on the practical writing achievement and influence on the literary world of the Tang Dynasty of nine writers, such as Yan Shigu, Cen Wenben, Li Qiao, Cui Rong, Zhang Shuo, Chang Gun, Li Jifu and Li Deyu, views the relationship between the "great" writers and the literary style and Confucianism of the Tang Dynasty, as well as explores their significance in literary history and discusses the fact that they were accepted by the later generations and the reasons why their literary reputation lost.)

results.title: 嘉靖革新研究( research on jiajing innovation ) [electronic resource]. 田澍.
abstracts: 本书内容包括：嘉靖之前明朝的统治危机、大礼议——嘉靖革新的前奏、嘉靖革新条件的生成、刷新科举与激发统治活力、清除翰林院积弊与强化内阁行政职能、裁革冗滥等。( The contents of this book include: the ruling crisis and the Great Rites Controversy of the Ming Dynasty before the Jiajing period- the prelude to Jiajing Innovation, generation of conditions of Jiajing Innovation, the vitality that refreshed the imperial examinations and stimulated the ruling, removal of the long-standing abuse of the Hanlin Academy and improvement of the administrative functions of the cabinet, reducing the redundant abuse, etc.)

results.title: 汉语完成体的认知功能研究(cognition function research on chinese perfect aspect) [electronic resource]. 李思旭.
abstracts: 本书试图运用多种理论，如认知语言学理论、语法化理论、语言类型学理论、韵律句法学理论等，全方位透视现代汉语完成体的共时变异和历时演变过程。具体探讨了补语"完"的内部划分、分布规律、语义指向、融合度等级、有界化差异等。对汉语史上的"完成"义动词或助词的历时沿革过程、完成体构式的历时衍生过程，以及汉语完成体和完成体构式的方言共性与差异进行了分析。最后尝试性地探讨了完成在汉语体貌系统中的地位和作用。 (The books tries to use many theories such as cognitive linguistics theory, grammaticalization theory, linguistic typology theory, prosodic syntax theory to analyze synchronic variation and diachronic evolution of the perfect aspect of modern Chinese. It specifically discussed internal partition, distribution rule, semantic orientation, integration level, bounded differences of the complement "Finish". It analyzed diachronic evolution process of notional verb or auxiliary word "finish", and diachronic derivatives process of the complete body, as well as similarities and differences of dialects of Chinese perfect aspect and the complete body. At last, the book tentatively discussed the position and role of "finish" in the Chinese aspectual system.)

results.title: 经学子学与文学论(on confucian classics, thoughts of hundreds of schools and literature) [electronic resource]. 李小成.
abstracts: 李小成编著的《经学子学与文学论》以经学、子学与文学为研究对象，范围虽广，但精神贯一，倚重于文献而展开讨论。全书分经学编、子学编和文学编三个部分。经学编侧重易学和东汉经学家马融的研究，亦及于礼学，有理论探究，也有研读文本中的考释。子学编以庄子和文中子为重点而兼及其当今的"新子学" 思潮。文学编中以天文星象为特色，考察了《诗经》与杜甫的诗歌，角度新颖。全书立足文献，实事求是，偏重考稽，小心求证，在此基础上融经、子、文学为一体，对国学与文学的研究多有启迪。(On Confucian Classics, Thoughts of Hundreds of Schools and Literature written by Li Xiaocheng takes Confucian classics, thoughts of hundreds of schools and literature as the research object. The range is wide, but the spirit is universal and the discussion is made on the basis of documents. The book is divided into three parts: Confucian classics, thoughts of hundreds of schools and literature. The volume of Confucian Classics focuses on yi-ology and the research of Ma Rong, a Confucianist scholar in the Eastern Han Dynasty, as well as ritual study，containing theory discussion and textual criticisms and explanations. The volume of thoughts of hundreds of schools focuses on Zhuangzi and Wenzhongzi, covering present "new thoughts of hundreds of schools" Ideological trend. The volume of literature features astronomy and astrology, studying "Classic of Poetry" and Du Fu's poems from new aspects. Based on documents, the whole book seeks truth from facts and lays particular stress on inspection and cautious verification, on the basis of which, Confucian classics, thoughts of hundreds of schools and literature are integrated together and have much enlightenment to studies of Chinese ancient civilization and literature.)

results.title: 胡适·鲁迅·莫言 (hu shih·lu xun·mo yan) [electronic resource] : 自由思想与新文学传统 (free thought and new literature tradition). 庄森.
abstracts: 本书通过阐释20世纪中国文学具代表性的人物胡适、鲁迅、莫言的文学思想、文学创作的文本，研究胡适的自由思想与自由思想与文学革命叙事、文学思想叙事，鲁迅的自由思想及其杂文传播的自由思想，莫言小说的自由思想、小说的批判精神，将当时的历史人物、历史事件与文本还原到日常生活逻辑上来加以考察，从经济、社会、文化等方面的材料探寻作家的自由思想与新文学的生成、发展、演变之因，梳理与研究新文学的发展脉络，提出原创性的独立见解，从一个全新的角度揭示新文学的发展演变规律，为深入研究中国现当代文学、文化提供了新的思路、新的视角。( By elaborating the literary thoughts and texts of literary creation of Hu Shih, Lu Xun and Mo Yan, representatives of Chinese literature in the 20th century, and studying Hu Shih's free thoughts, literature revolution narrative and literary thought narrative, Lu Xun's free thoughts and those spread by his essays, and Mo Yan's free thoughts and critical spirit in his novels, this book reproduces historical figures, events and texts with the logic in daily life for investigation and explores the writers' free thoughts and the causes of new literature's generation, development and evolution from economy, society, culture and other aspects. It presents and studies the development of new literature, puts forward original and distinctive opinions, and reveals the development and evolution law of new literature from a new perspective, providing new thoughts and perspectives for further research on modern and contemporary Chinese literature and culture.)

results.title: 北朝石刻文献的文学研究( literary study of stone carved inscriptions of the northern dynasties ) [electronic resource]. 张鹏.
abstracts: 本书以北朝石刻文献为研究对象，运用文体学、文本分析以及文学史研究等方法，对石刻文献中包含的文学文体、文学文本及其所体现出的文学的时序特征、地域特征以及与文学有关的宗教、文化因素等做了全面论述。( This book takes the stone carved inscription of the Northern Dynasties as the study object and applies methods such as stylistics, text analysis and literary history research to comprehensively expound the literary stylistics and text of the stone carved inscriptions and literary timing characteristics and regional features they present and the religious and cultural factors related to the literature.)

results.title: 中国原生态文化问题研究 (research on chinese original culture) [electronic resource] : 文化经济学的视野 (from a perspective of cultural economy). 刘宗碧.
abstracts: 原生态文化是我国近年兴起的文化现象。刘宗碧和唐晓梅编著的《中国原生态文化问题研究（文化经济学的视野）》立足文化经济学的视野，通过大量调查实证，梳理了我国原生态文化概念使用谱系，尤其梳理了在市场化过程中出现的传统文化再生产，即文化产品在商业活动、企业开发、文化市场中的实际发生，呈现了原生态文化实践的产业事实。在把握事实的前提下，在理论上分析了原生态文化现象产生的当代性以及表达为一种主体生产活动的实质；同时基于目前市场经济的文化产业化背景分析了这种就传统文化资源进行重构性生产的特点、价值及意义，解答了当代出现原生态文化现象的原因并揭开了其表达为经济范畴的属性。 (The original culture is a cultural phenomenon emerged in recent years in China. Written and compiled by Liu Zongbi and Tang Xiaomei, Research on Chinese Original Culture (From a Perspective of Cultural Economy) is based on a perspective of cultural economy. With the support of a large number of empirical surveys, the book reviews the pedigree of Chinese original culture's concepts, especially the reproduction of traditional culture emerged in the process of marketization, i.e., the actual occurrence of cultural products in commercial activities, enterprise development and cultural market, showing the industrialization of original culture practice. With facts being the precondition, the book theoretically analyze the contemporary nature of original culture's emergence and its essence of being the expression of main production activities; meanwhile, based on the current background of cultural industrialization, the book analyzes the features, value and significance of traditional culture resources being reproduced and identifies the reasons for the emergence of original culture phenomenon as well as reveals its properties manifested in economic category.)

results.title: 宋代土地制度史( history of the land system of the song dynasty) [electronic resource]. 郦家驹.
abstracts: 本书是郦家驹先生的遗稿，撰写于1995年12月至1996年11月之际，郦家驹先生学识渊博，国学根底深厚，对宋史很有研究。20世纪70年代与邓广铭教授共同筹组中国宋史研究会，推动宋史研究工作的发展。本书资料丰富，内容翔实，结构合理，文笔流畅，是他多年潜心研究的力作。 ( This book is the posthumous manuscript written from December 1995 to November 1996 by of Mr. Li Jiaju. Mr. Li Jiaju was learned and had a deep study on Chinese ancient civilization and history of the Song Dynasty. In the 1970s, he and Professor Deng Guangming jointly prepared and organized the China Association for Song Dynasty Studies to promote study of the history of the Song Dynasty. This book contains an easy and fluent style with abundant information, substantial content and rational construction, being a masterpiece of his years of painstaking study.)

results.title: 爱新觉罗家族史(history of the aisin gioro clan) [electronic resource]. 刘小萌.
abstracts: 爱新觉罗家族历史悠久，被清朝尊为肇祖原皇帝的孟特穆（猛哥帖木儿）自明朝初叶已见诸史籍。1616年（明万历四十四年），清太祖努尔哈赤创立清朝的前身——后金国，标志着爱新觉罗家族登上历史的舞台。从1644年（清顺治元年）清朝入关，君临天下，迄至末代皇帝溥仪于1911年（宣统三年）退位，该家族统治中国长达268年之久。刘小萌编著的这本《爱新觉罗家族史》将爱新觉罗家族饱经沧桑的一部兴衰史，放在特定社会环境下加以考察，并为其发展勾勒出一个大体清晰的轮廓。全书九卷，时间起自元末明初，迄于20世纪末，重点在有清一代。按照历史的发展，分阶段阐述该家族的变迁。其中，重要人物的活动，重要事件的影响，家族制度的兴衰，族内关系的演变，是贯穿始终又相互交织的几条线索。(The Aisin Gioro clan has a long history. Mentemu (or Möngke Temür) respected as Zhaozu by the Qing Dynasty had appeared in the history books since the early Ming Dynasty. In 1616 (the 44th year of Emperor Wanli's reign in the Ming Dynasty), Emperor Taizu of the Qing Dynasty Nurhaci found the predecessor of the Qing Dynasty—Later Jin Dynasty, marking that the Aisin Gioro clan ascended on the stage of history. From the Manchu conquest of China in 1644 (the first year of the Shunzhi Emperor's reign of the Qing Dynasty to the abdication of the last emperor Puyi in 1911 (the third year of the Xuantong Emperor's reign), this family had ruled China for 268 years. History of the Aisin Gioro clan compiled by Liu Xiaomeng studies the rise and fall history of the Aisin Gioro clan full of vicissitudes under the particular social environment and draws a roughly clear outline of its development. The whole book has nine volumes. The time starts from the end of the Yuan Dynasty and the beginning of the Ming Dynasty to the end of the 20th century. The key is the existing period of the Qing Dynasty. According to the development of history, the vicissitudes of the family is expounded by stages. Activities of important figures, influence of important events, the rise and fall of the family system and the evolution of relationship within the family are a few clues running throughout and intertwined.)

results.title: 宋代集句诗研究( study on the jiju poems in the song dynasty ) [electronic resource]. 张福清.
abstracts: 本书是学界第一部专题研究宋代集句诗的成果。其将宋代三百余年的集句诗分为早、中、晚三期加以系统论述，以王安石、孔平仲、苏轼、黄庭坚、胡伟、闻人祥正、释绍嵩，李龏、文天祥等为代表，探讨有宋一代集句诗的内容和形式特点以及在集唐诗、集宋诗上所呈现的规律，探索集句诗"以词为诗"现象和诗歌传播与接受诗学价值，整理了宋代重要集句诗对《全唐诗》《全宋诗》的校勘、辨重、辑佚等方面的文献价值。( This is the first book especially on Jiju poems of the Song Dynasty in the academic circles. It divides Jiju poems composed within over 300 years in the Song Dynasty into three groups, namely those composed in the early, middle and late Song Dynasty and discusses them systematically. Taking Wang Anshi, Kong Pingzhong, Su Shi, Huang Tingjian, Hu Wei, Wenren Xiangzheng, Shi Shaosong, Li Gong, Wen Tianxiang as representatives, it explores the characteristics of contents and forms of Jiju poems in the Song Dynasty and the rules of Tang and Song Jiju poems. It explores the fact that Jiju poems are composed of verses in ci, the poetry transmission and value of accepting poetics and sorts out important Song Jiju poems' literature value to the "Complete Tang Poems" and "Complete Song Poems" in emendation, reduction, compilation and edition.)

results.title: 中国东北汉文化史述(narration of chinese culture in northeast china) [electronic resource]. 田子馥.
abstracts: 本书以考古新发现的全新视角，对东北地区的辽西红山文化、本溪庙后山文化、兴隆洼文化等经过梳理，发现史前东北文化区有13项全国第一，被专家认定东北乃中华文化第一祖源。汉族是东北地区的主体民族，汉文化是东北地区的主体文化。汉政权在东北有时可以断档，汉文化始终没有断档，而且居于东北的各民族以及各民族政权，无不接受汉文化的滋养而成长壮大，乃至入主中原或半入主中原。汉文化也接受了少数民族文化的精华。(The book has a new perspective on new discoveries in archaeological work. After analyzing the Liaoxi Hongshan Culture, Benxi Miaohoushan Culture, Xinglongwa Culture in Northeast China, experts found that prehistoric Northeast China District has 13 items that rank the first in the whole country and Northeast China is considered as the first ancestor source of Chinese Culture by experts. Chinese people are principal body in Northeast China and Chinese culture is the main culture in Northeast China. Chinese regime for some parts of time does not exist in Northeast China, but Chinese culture never perished. Besides, all ethnic groups in Northeast China and ethnic group regimes were cultivated by Chinese culture and grow rapidly. They eventually went into Central Plains or half of Central Plains. Chinese culture also absorbed essence of culture of ethnic minorities.)

results.title: 话语·语境·文本 (discourse, context and text) [electronic resource] : 中国现代诗学探微 (studies on chinese modern poetics). 薛世昌.
abstracts: 本书分内篇、外篇和杂篇三部分。内篇为入乎其内的现代诗歌文本内部研究。外篇为出乎其外的现代诗歌的时空处境研究。杂篇为比较具体的诗人与作品的文本阐释。全书立足于认真的文本释读，纵论现代诗歌的艰难历程，直面现代诗歌的当下处境，思考现代诗歌的未来走向，同时坦陈对当下著名诗人以及活跃诗人的独立诗见，论题多元，文笔清通，不乏新颖见解，是一部值得一读的现代诗学专著。( This book contains three parts, namely internal chapter, external chapter and miscellaneous chapter. The internal chapter studies the interior of the text of modern poems in the book. The external chapter studies the space-time situation of modern poems outside the book. The miscellaneous chapter is about the quite specific text explanation of poets and their works. The entire book, based on sincere text explanation, vertically discusses the difficult situation of modern poems, faces the current position of modern poems and thinks about the future orientation of modern poems. Moreover, it calmly talks about the personal opinions of present famous and active poets about poems with various topics and in a simple and understandable way. Novel opinions are also inclusive. It's a modern treatise on poetics which is worth reading.)

results.title: 元末明初士大夫政治文化与文学研究( studies on scholar-officials’ political culture and literature during the later yuan and early ming) [electronic resource]. 赵伟.
abstracts: 明初的政治思想以及由此而形成的士大夫对于"道"的追求和坚持，对整个明代政治文化的形成和在这种政治文化背景下的文学观念产生了重大的影响。本书以元末明初黄溍-宋濂-方孝孺的学术师承为主线，探讨政治文化与这种政治文化背景下而出现的"任道"、"趋道"文学观念。 ( Political ideas and scholar-officials' pursuit and insistence of "Taoism" based on it during the early Ming Dynasty have significant influence on the formation of the political culture in the whole Ming Dynasty and literary ideas based on such a background of political culture. This book's main line is that Fang Xiaoru learnt from Song Lian and Song Lian learnt from Huang Jin during the later Yuan and early Ming, and studies political culture and the literary idea of "adopting doctrines" and "pursuing doctrines" arising from such a background of political culture.)

results.title: 《国语》研究(study on guoyu) [electronic resource]. 李佳.
abstracts: 《国语》是先秦一部重要典籍，与《左传》有"内外传"之称，无论在经学、史学、文学都具有一定地位。但学界对该书的关注向来不够，研究成果亦显零散且缺乏深入。本书在前人时贤基础之上，同时吸收港台和海外研究成果，从目录版本、编纂成书以及文学成就等诸多方面，对《国语》进行了一个较为全面、系统的研究。 (Guoyu is an important ancient book in the pre-Qin period. It's known as "interior and exterior chronicles" with Zuo Zhuan and has a certain status in fields of the Confucian classics, historical science and literature. But the academic circle doesn't pay sufficient attention to Guoyu and research results on it are also obviously scattered and not profound enough. On the basis of the predecessors' research, absorbing the research results in Hong Kong and Taiwan and overseas at the same time, this book conducts a relatively comprehensive and systematic research on Guoyu from many aspects like the catalog version, compilation and literary achievements.)

results.title: 二人转与东北文化传统( errenzhuan and traditional culture of northeast china) [electronic resource]. 杨旸.
abstracts: 本书试图回答与其他戏曲或曲艺形式相比，二人转为什么具有巨大的艺术裹卷力和冲击力。因此，该书首先探讨二人转与原始仪式关系问题；接着探讨二人转与萨满的关系，之后探讨二人转与东北神话的传统，最后探讨二人转文化传统争论。得出结论认为，二人转之所以产生巨大的艺术裹卷力和冲击力，首先是来自二人转的意象，是二人转因为连着这部东北文化史，才使二人转连着它的源头。也正因为连着它的源头，二人转才获得了无穷的艺术魅力。( This book attempts to answer why Errenzhuan has such great artistic wrapping force and impact compared with other forms of drama or opera. Therefore, this book first explores the relationship between Errenzhuan and primitive rites; then explores Errenzhuan and the tradition of myth in Northeast China and the debate of traditional culture of Errenzhuan. This book reaches a condition that Errenzhuan has such great artistic wrapping force and impact because of the image of Errenzhuan which connects the cultural history of Northeast China which is its source. As it connects its source, Errenzhuan gets infinite artistic charm.)

results.title: 古史新探，第2辑( new research on ancient history- series 2 ) [electronic resource]. 程民生.
abstracts: 河南省普通高校人文社会科学重点研究基地河南大学中国古代史研究中心，秉承河南大学历史学科的一贯学风和《古史新探》编辑原则，作者程民生从中心成员近一年多的研究成果中，选出在知名学术刊物上发表的22篇论文编辑成第二辑，串珠成链 ，呈现给学界。阵营中老中青齐备，而青年学者占了 一半；内容上从夏代到清代，政治、经济、文化、考 古、历史地理等等俱全，而宋史研究占了近三分之一 ，展示了河南大学中国古代史学科的优良传统。( Center for Research on Ancient Chinese History of Henan University is the key base of research on humanistic and social science of regular HEIs in Henan Province. Adhering to the consistent style of the history discipline in Henan University and the editing principles of ancient history of New Research on Ancient History, the author Cheng Minsheng selected 22 papers published in famous academic journals from the research results of members in the center in nearly a year and edited them into the second series to present them to the academic circles. The authors of the papers selected include both young and old scholars, and young scholars account for half; the content is comprehensive, from the Xia Dynasty to the Qing Dynasty, including politics, economy, culture, archaeology, history, geography, etc., and research on the history of the Song Dynasty accounts for nearly one third, showing the fine tradition of Chinese ancient history discipline in Henan University.)

results.title: 先秦汉语方所标记研究( studies on location mark of chinese language in the pre-qin period) [electronic resource]. 史维国.
abstracts: 本书分编和第二编两部分，编是汉语方所标记的断代研究，主要探讨了方所标记的基本理论，以及先秦汉语处所词、处所代词、方位词、方位短语、处所动词、处所介词、方所句式、个案研究等9个方面的问题。第二编是关于《左传》方所标记的专书研究，分别对《左传》方所标记研究概况、《左传》处所词、《左传》处所动词、《左传》处所介词进行了探讨，同时还归纳出了《〈左传〉专名处所词音义频次对照表》和《〈左传〉带处所介词词组的处所动词音义、类别、频次对照表》。本书力图将语言描写和理论解释相结合、断代研究和专书研究相结合，对先秦汉语方所标记作系统全面的研究，丰富有关标记理论的内容。( This book consists of two parts, namely Volume and Volume II. Volume is the dynastic study on location mark of Chinese language. It mainly studies the basic theories of location mark and Pre-Qin Chinese location vocabularies, location pronouns, nouns of locality, locality phrases, location verbs, location prepositions, location sentence patterns and individual cases. Volume II is a special study about the location mark in Zuo Zhuan. It probes into the general situation of the research of location mark, location vocabularies, location verbs and location prepositions in Zuo Zhuan. Besides, it also summarizes them in "Parallel Table of the Pronunciation, Meaning and Frequency of Special Location Vocabularies of Zuo Zhuan" and "Parallel Table of the Pronunciation, Meaning, Category and Frequency of the Location Verbs with Location Preposition Phrases of Zuo Zhuan." This book tries to systematically and fully study the location mark of Chinese language in the Pre-Qin Period by combining linguistic description and theoretical explanation, dynastic research and special research, enriching the content of relevant mark theories.)

results.title: 管子思想钩沉(exploration research on guanzi's thought) [electronic resource]. 邓加荣.
abstracts: 《管子思想钩沉》一书是作者邓加荣、张靖多年来对管子思想研究成果的结集，全书共有十篇文章：《管子》作者年代考，《管子》构建和谐社会的基本思路，管子经济思想的多层面透析，管子法制思想三探，管子的人才观，管子的教育思想，管子的道德观、荣辱观，管子的义利观、价值观，管子的与时俱进思想，《管子》语言的深刻隽永、精辟独到，从多方面、多角度、全方位地分析了管子之人及《管子》之书，对其二者进行了深刻的解读。书中的附录部分还对儒家思想的发展脉络进行了梳理，补充了儒家构想的理想社会及孟子小康社会的践行，对墨子、荀子等人的经济思想与管子的经济思想做了对照说明，还就儒家关于性本善还是性本恶的大论战进行了阐述，将各派所持观点分为五类，有助于读者更好地了解儒家之学说。 (Exploration Research on Guanzi's Thought is a collection of Deng Jiarong and Zhang Jing's research results on Guanzi's thought, containing ten articles in total: Author's date verification of Guanzi, basic idea of building a harmonious society in Guanzi, multidimensional analysis of Guan Zhong's economic thought, "three analysis" on Guan Zhong's legal thought, talent thought of Guan Zhong, Guan Zhong's education thought, Guan Zhong's morality and outlook for honor and dishonor, Guan Zhong's idea of moral and profit and values, Guan Zhong's thought of keeping pace with the times, and profound, meaningful, incisive and unique language of Guanzi. This book analyzes Guan Zhong and his book from different aspects and angles in an all-round way and deeply interprets them. The appendix part of the book also generalizes the development course of the Confucian school, supplements the practice of ideal society conceived by the Confucian school and the well-off society of Mencius, compares and explains Mozi, Xunzi and Guanzi's economic thoughts, states the Confucian school's great debate on whether human nature is good or bad, and divides views of all schools into five categories to help readers get a better understanding of the doctrine of the Confucian school.)

results.title: 中国文化产业振兴之路 (road to revitalize china's cultural industry) [electronic resource]. 陈伯君 (ChenBojun).
abstracts: 本书力求理清文化强国、体制改革、民营文化企业三者的内在关系，采用解剖标本案例的方式，潜入底层，深度调查，观察生逢其时的民营文化企业，在国家建设文化强国的强烈意愿下，在文化体制改革跌宕起伏的大潮中，如何通过自己的实践证实民营文产企业是中国文化强国路上不可或缺的生力军，如何通过对实践的总结和理论创新为中图文化价值影响世界贡献新经验。本书所做的调查分析、经验提升、理论总结，可供文化体制改革决策参考．可供各地政府促进文化产业参考，可供文化产业的研究和教学使用，可供从业人士学习借鉴。(This book endeavors to make clear the interrelationship among cultural powerful country, system reform and private cultural enterprises. It applies the method of analyzing sample cases to investigate deeply from the basic level into the private cultural enterprises of the times. It studies the way private cultural enterprises prove themselves by practice to be an indispensible part on the road of establishing a cultural powerful country under the circumstance of cultural system reform. It also studies the way private cultural enterprises contribute to the exertion of influence of China's cultural value on the world by summarizing through practice and theoretical innovation. The survey and analysis, experience up-lifting, and theoretical summaries in this book can provide the cultural system reform with reference to make decisions, provide the local governments with reference to promote cultural enterprises, provide the cultural enterprises with reference to research and learn, and provide the professionals with references to learn from.)

results.title: 东方文化西传及其对近代欧洲的影响 [electronic resource]. 孙锦全.
abstracts: 人们在考察东西方文化互动以及交流时，比较多地注意到了近代西欧文化向东方传播的趋势，这股文化潮流的东向移动，被谓之"西学东渐"，在回顾中世纪东方文化西传的历史之后，我们不得不作这样的认识：所谓"西学东渐"的"西学"是富含经欧人吸收、改造、沿袭的东方文化成分特质的欧洲新文化思潮，"东渐"则又寓示着东方文化某种程度的回归，站在这个基点上，"全盘西化"等提法显然都是欠妥的，犯了出口布料，经人加工为成衣，又被视为洋货进口同样的错误。.

results.title: Hitler's second book [electronic resource] : The Unpublished Sequel to Mein Kampf. Adolf Hitler.
abstracts: "Provides a valuable insight into the development of ideas that were to shape Hitler's foreign policy after 1933."—Jeremy Noakes, The Times Literary Supplement“The text bears all of Hitler's hallmarks, along with a terrifying, sustained belief in war and violence as a means to ensure that Germany would flourish."—Publishers Weekly“He envisaged the German people becoming involved in a series of wars for Lebensraum culminating in an epic battle against America."—Michael Smith, Daily Telegraph“The Second Book is in many ways more important than Mein Kampf."—Guardian“I have never known anyone to say this is a forged document."—Volker Berghahn, The New York Times“Hitler admires the 'young, racially select' American people and the nation's restrictive immigration policies at the time."—The New York Times“Far more than Mein Kampf, the Second Book establishes the grandiose scale of Hitler's ambitions."—Dennis Showalter, Colorado College“More clearly than ever, Hitler sketched out the worldwide struggle against the Jews which he and his party had to lead."—Richard Overy, GuardianHitler's Second Book is the first complete and annotated edition of the manuscript Hitler dictated shortly before his rise to power four year after publishing Mein Kampf. It contains a catalog of shocking policy statements and previously undisclosed plans of world conquest at the core of Nazi ideology that Hitler concluded were too provocative for publication.
